entry.title: Creating a line chart with chartjs and React

link.title: Creating a line chart with chartjs and React

entry.summary: Adding charts to your website might be useful and it will always look fancy and glamorous. This is a tutorial to create a line chart in your application using React and Chart.js. You can find the full project here. Our chart should look like this: Sections Installing Create React App Installing dependencies Folder structure Usage Adding file...

entry.title: Generating a static site with template shell script

link.title: Generating a static site with template shell script

entry.summary: This is a tutorial to generate a static website using Bourne shell(sh) scripting and terminal arguments. You can find the full project here. In this project we’ll create a simple site to show a list of contacts that you can pass typing the arguments or concatenating a text file. Prerequisites This was created using Ubuntu 22.04, Sublime Text 3 and Firefox. You only need to know the very b...
